00036 template<typename Point>
00037 void gmst(std::vector<Point> &points, std::vector<std::pair<typename std::vector<Point>::size_type,  typename std::vector<Point>::size_type> > &mst)
00038 {
00039   zorder_lt<Point> lt;
00040   std::vector<WSP<Point> > wsp;
00041   int_partition UF;
00042   int num_threads=1;
00043   
00044 #ifdef _OPENMP
00045   num_threads = omp_get_max_threads();
00046 #endif
00047   sort(points.begin(), points.end(), lt);
00048   pwspd<Point> A(points, 1.0);
00049   A.run(wsp, num_threads);
00050   UF.initialize(points.size());
00051   FilterKruskal<Point> B(A, UF, mst);
00052   B.run(wsp.begin(), wsp.end(), 0);
00053 }
00054 
00055 template<typename Point>
00056 class edgePred
00057 {
00058   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00059   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00060 public:
00061   std::vector<Point> &points;
00062   
00063   edgePred(std::vector<Point> &p): points(p)
00064   {
00065   };
00066 
00067   bool operator()(const Edge a, const Edge b)
00068   {
00069     double da, db;
00070     
00071     da = points[a.first].sqr_dist(points[a.second]);
00072     db = points[b.first].sqr_dist(points[b.second]);
00073     return (da < db);
00074   }
00075 };

00082 template<typename Point>
00083 void bfgmst(std::vector<Point> &points, std::vector<std::pair<typename std::vector<Point>::size_type,  typename std::vector<Point>::size_type> > &mst)
00084 {
00085   typedef typename std::vector<Point>::size_type size_type;
00086   typedef std::pair<size_type, size_type> Edge;
00087 
00088   std::vector<Edge> edges;
00089 
00090   for(int i=0;i < (int) points.size();++i)
00091     {
00092       for(int j=0;j < (int) points.size();++j)
00093         {
00094           if(i!=j)
00095             edges.push_back(Edge(i,j));
00096         }
00097     }
00098   edgePred<Point> pred(points);
00099   sort(edges.begin(), edges.end(), pred);
00100 
00101   int_partition UF;
00102   UF.initialize(points.size());
00103 
00104   for(int i=0;i < (int) edges.size();++i)
00105     {
00106       if(UF.find(edges[i].first) != UF.find(edges[i].second))
00107         {
00108           mst.push_back(edges[i]);
00109           UF.union_blocks(edges[i].first, edges[i].second);
00110         }
00111     }
00112 }
00113 #endif
